abilities.name: Pattern Distraction
abilities.effect: As long as Spinda is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent's Basic Pokémon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing. You can't use more than 1 Pattern Distraction Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Whimsy Draw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Spinda does 10 damage to itself.
